markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Share Eidolon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2935) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 72 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Magical Understudy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2896)

</column>

---

Your eidolon shares innate spells with you. You can cast the innate spells your eidolon gained from Magical Understudy, [Magical Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=2920), and [Magical Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=2940). You and your eidolon share the same daily uses of these innate spells.
name: Share Eidolon Magic

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Share Eidolon Magic Source Secrets of Magic pg. 72 1.1 Prerequisites Magical Understudy --- Your eidolon shares innate spells with you. You can cast the innate spells your eidolon gained from Magical Understudy, Magical Adept, and Magical Master. You and your eidolon share the same daily uses of these innate spells.
